resources.string: Tobermory is the main town on the Isle of Mull. Tobermory has a large pontoon with facilities including showers and laundry. There are also a large number of visitor moorings.
Salen is a small village located halfway up the island on the east coast. With a Spar shop and the Salen hotel offering drinks, it proves an ideal anchorage.
Craignure is where the ferry docks from Oban. It has a drying pier to the South which is within walking distance of the Craignure Inn.
Iona is home to Iona Abbey which was founded by St. Columba in the year 563.
"Staffa is an Island on the west coast. Boats leave from Tobermory and Fionnphort regularly but require booking. Fingal's Cave is one of the main attractions."
Calgary bay is easily accessible by boat and a 30 minute drive by car from Tobermory. The large white sandy beach makes for a fantastic picnic spot.

Weather data is gathered from openweathermap.org. Weather station is in Oban. Press 24 hours for a detailed 24 hour forecast. Press 72 hours for a less detailed 72 hour forecast. Scroll along to see all the data.
